11822.quoteDoc: Privacy Policy for Bitdefender Home Solutions
11822.quoteText: We do not sell you data.
11822.title: This service does not sell your personal data

tosdr.case: This service does not sell your personal data

11824.quoteDoc: Privacy Policy for Bitdefender Home Solutions
11824.quoteText: we collect only that personal data absolutely necessary for the specified purposes, on a best efforts basis.
11824.title: Your personal data is used for limited purposes

tosdr.case: Your personal data is used for limited purposes

11825.quoteDoc: Privacy Policy for Bitdefender Home Solutions
11825.quoteText: As regards the use of these data for marketing purposes, the legal basis we use is legitimate interest for marketing communications with users of our Home Solutions (based on Recital 47 of GDPR and Romanian law 506/2004, art 12 (2) that is implementing the EU E-privacy directive), unless those persons have opted out.
11825.title: You can opt out of promotional communications

tosdr.case: You can opt out of promotional communications

11826.quoteText: Cookies may also be used for website optimization or marketing.
11826.title: This service may use your personal information for marketing purposes

tosdr.case: This service may use your personal information for marketing purposes

11827.quoteText: ometimes we might use external Bitdefender services which may place third party cookies when navigating the Bitdefender websites, their purposes are for marketing, traffic analysis and social media sharing, as indicated in website.
11827.title: Tracking via third-party cookies for other purposes without your consent.

tosdr.case: Tracking via third-party cookies for other purposes without your consent.

11828.quoteText: The privacy policy has been adopted on 10 May 2018 and will be modified each time is necessary without prior or future notice of the changes.
11828.title: Terms may be changed any time at their discretion, without notice to the user

tosdr.case: Terms may be changed any time at their discretion, without notice to the user

11866.quoteText: In this context, Bitdefender processes personal data for the following main purposes:
11866.title: The service provides information about how they intend to use your personal data

tosdr.case: The service provides information about how they intend to use your personal data

11867.quoteText:
2. Personal data collected

Bitdefender may collect personal information from its users in four different ways:
11867.title: The service provides information about how they collect personal data

tosdr.case: The service provides information about how they collect personal data

11870.quoteText: 2.2. Traffic data â€“ when a user visits a website, it automatically reveals certain information, such as the IP address,
11870.title: This service collects your IP address for location use

tosdr.case: This service collects your IP address for location use

11871.quoteText: or the referral website that sent you to Bitdefender websites.
11871.title: This service tracks which web page referred you to it

tosdr.case: This service tracks which web page referred you to it

11872.quoteText: We also use other external services of traffic analysis, such as Google Analytics, Adobe Analytics.
11872.title: This service uses third-party cookies for statistics

tosdr.case: This service uses third-party cookies for statistics

11873.quoteText:
The data is kept only as long as they are necessary for these purposes.
The legal basis for this collection is legitimate interest for Improving our website for the ensuring the security of your website.
11873.title: The service's data retention period is kept to the minimum necessary for fulfilling its purposes

tosdr.case: The service's data retention period is kept to the minimum necessary for fulfilling its purposes

11874.quoteText: For example, we use first party cookies for identification or communication purposes, such remembering your language, communication sessions or setting, other details necessary for a correct functioning of our website.
11874.title: This service requires first-party cookies

tosdr.case: This service requires first-party cookies

11875.quoteText: Most browsers are configured to automatically accept cookies. However, you can decide to reinstall the browser or to set it up in order to notify you each time a cookie is placed or even to refuse cookies. If your browser is configured not to allow all cookies some sections of our website may not be correctly displayed.
11875.title: Blocking first party cookies may limit your ability to use the service

tosdr.case: Blocking first party cookies may limit your ability to use the service

11876.quoteText: Bitdefender may use other IT companies to process the collected personal data.
11876.title: This service gathers information about you through third parties

tosdr.case: This service gathers information about you through third parties

11877.quoteText:
These companies are considered data processors and have strict contractual obligations to keep the confidentiality of the processed data and to offer at least the same level of security as Bitdefender.
Data processors have the obligation not to allow third parties to process personal data on behalf of Bitdefender and to access, use and/or keep the data secure and confidential.
11877.title: Third parties used by the service are bound by confidentiality obligations

tosdr.case: Third parties used by the service are bound by confidentiality obligations

11878.quoteText:
Access to certain sections of Bitdefender websites is protected by a username and password. We recommend not to reveal this password. Bitdefender will never ask for your account's password via any kind of messages or phone calls. We advise not to disclose your password to anyone asking you to do so. If possible, we also recommend to log out of your online services account after each session. We also advice to close the browser window after navigating or using Bitdefender services.

Unfortunately, transferring data over the Internet cannot be 100% secure.
11878.title: The service informs users about the risk of publishing personal info online

tosdr.case: The service informs users about the risk of publishing personal info online

11879.quoteText: Consequently, despite our efforts to protect personal data, Bitdefender cannot assure or guarantee the security of the information transmitted by the user until the information is on our servers. Any information you transmit is done on your own risk.
11879.title: You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and for the activities on your account

tosdr.case: You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and for the activities on your account

11880.quoteText: Exceptionally, Bitdefender may reveal personal data to competent authorities, upon their legal request according to the applicable laws or when this is necessary to protect the rights and interests of our clients and Bitdefender.
11880.title: The service will not allow third parties to access your personal information without a legal basis

tosdr.case: The service will not allow third parties to access your personal information without a legal basis

11881.quoteText: According to European Union applicable data protection legislation, data subjects shall have the right to access to data, rectification, erasure, restriction on processing
11881.title: You can request access and deletion of personal data

tosdr.case: You can request access and deletion of personal data

11882.title: This service allows you to retrieve an archive of your data

tosdr.case: This service allows you to retrieve an archive of your data
tosdr.tldr: Full quote: "According to European Union applicable data protection legislation, data subjects shall have the right to access to data, rectification, erasure, restriction on processing, objection to processing and right to data portability."

11883.quoteText:
For exercising these rights, you may send a written request, dated and signed and send it to the above mentioned Bitdefender headquarters or via email to privacy@bitdefender.com

You also have the right to to lodge a complaint with a competent supervisory authority.
11883.title: The service provides a complaint mechanism for the handling of personal data

tosdr.case: The service provides a complaint mechanism for the handling of personal data

11884.quoteText: Most of these data is being used only as aggregated data.
11884.title: Only aggregate data is given to third parties

tosdr.case: Only aggregate data is given to third parties

11885.quoteText: Bitdefender, like any other website manager, may record this kind of information for a limited period of time.
11885.title: User logs are deleted after a finite period of time

tosdr.case: User logs are deleted after a finite period of time
